official_title: A bill to establish the Waco Mammoth National Monument in the State of Texas, and for other purposes.
short_title: Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2011

summary.text: Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2011 - Establishes the Waco Mammoth National Monument in Texas as a unit of the National Park System. Requires the Secretary of the Interior, in consultation with Baylor University and the city of Waco, to complete a general management plan for the Monument.

titles.title: Waco Mammoth National Monument Establishment Act of 2011
A bill to establish the Waco Mammoth National Monument in the State of Texas, and for other purposes.
